definition: to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Is menstruation have loose bowels normal phenomenon?
sentences.chinese: 月经期间拉肚子是正常现象吗？

sentences.english: After why becoming gall-stone operation easy have loose bowels?
sentences.chinese: 为什么做了胆结石手术后容易拉肚子？

sentences.english: Now I'm at work with diarrhea, and trotting to the bathroom every 30 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 现在我不停地拉肚子，半小时跑一趟厕所。

sentences.english: You can't ride this horse. It scours.
sentences.chinese: 你不能骑这匹马，它在拉肚子。

sentences.english: Other what symptom can have loose bowels cause?
sentences.chinese: 拉肚子会引起其他什么症状？

sentences.english: In the beginning, I had diarrhea, then I got cough and running nose.
sentences.chinese: 先是拉肚子，然后咳嗽和不停的流鼻水。

sentences.english: Food notices, why summer or easy have loose bowels?
sentences.chinese: 饮食都注意，为何夏天还是容易拉肚子？

sentences.english: But when back to home, I had diarrhea and ran a low grade fever.
sentences.chinese: 可是回家后就拉肚子兼发低烧，郁闷哦。

sentences.english: Never prepare food for others if you have diarrhea or vomiting.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有拉肚子或呕吐症状，请不要给别人准备食物。

sentences.english: Did not have epinosic thing, why easy have loose bowels ?
sentences.chinese: 没吃不卫生的东西，为什么容易拉肚子？

sentences.english: Successive two days all the time is have loose bowels alvine path problem?
sentences.chinese: 连续两天一直拉肚子是肠道问题么？

sentences.english: Eating spicy hot pot always causes me to have diarrhea and cramps.
sentences.chinese: 每次吃麻辣火锅都会让我拉肚子和肚子痛。

sentences.english: I feel like vomiting and have diarrhea.
sentences.chinese: 我想要呕吐又想拉肚子。

definition: (coll.) to have diarrhea/to shrink back/to cower
to get sick because of bad food
(of food) to retain in stomach due to indigestion (TCM)
